Translations.Text: Dni pojdem when GOD will zvolat posol ziadat them Ako je response do ona? They say My nie have znalost! Ona bol Knower all secrets

GOD will say O Jesus SYN Mary zapamatat si MOJ blessings ONA TVOJ MATKA! Ja supported ona Holy Spirit enable ona speak do ludia crib i mat rad dospely! Ja taught ona scripture wisdom Torah Gospel. Recall lenze ona created z il shape bird Moj odist potom blew it it became zit bird Moj odist! Ona healed blind leprous Moj odist revived dead Moj odist! Recall ja chranit ona Dieta Izrael chudoba zranit ona profound zazrak ona shown them! disbelievers them said ‘This bol obviously kuzlo
Recall ja inspirovat disciples ‘Ona verit v Mi Moj posol ' They said ‘My verit bear svedok my bol submitters
Recall lenze disciples said O Jesus syn Mary mozem tvoj Lord send us feast sky He said Ona reverence GOD ona bol believers
They said My zelat jestn z it reassure our srdce zauzlit istota ze ona told us truth! My serve svedok thereof
